statements: DELETE FROM vehicle_performance_data WHERE vehicle_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM VehicleData WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND fuel_level < 20;
DELETE FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE tire_pressure > 37 AND battery_voltage < 12.5;
DELETE FROM vehicle_data WHERE speed < 50 AND fuel_level > 30;
DELETE FROM VehicleData WHERE vehicle_id = 123 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM DiagnosticData WHERE timestamp > '2022-02-15' AND vehicle_id IN (456, 789);
